title: No citation for 'ssp370' AerChemMIP experiment
description: No citation exists for the three ensemble members of the AerChemMIP experiment 'ssp370'. The WIP decided that this experiment will remain uncitable (see discussion in github ticket 951; url below). As a workaround the AerChemMIP contribution of MPI-ESM1.2-HAM can be cited instead (see DOI below). The listed datasets are only exemplary. All datasets of the three ensemble members of 'ssp370' are affected.
